category: National Sports Competition Regulations/Article 27 (Host Region Steering Committee)
contents: Article 27 (Host Region Steering Committee) ① In order to prepare for the competition in the city/county/district host region where the game is held, the Organizing Committee may form a Host Region Steering Committee with officials from the host region as follows. Revised on July 29, 2020, January 24, 2022. The chairperson shall be the head of the local government of the host city. 2. The vice-chairperson shall be the vice-president of the local government of the venue, the police chief, the chairman of the city/county/district sports association of the venue, and other personnel. 3. The steering committee members include the directors and auditors of the city/county/district sports council of the host city, the head of the sports organization of the host city, and other personnel. ② The executive director or secretary of the city/county/district sports association of the venue may attend the steering committee as the person in charge of preparation for the competition. Revised 2022. 1. 24.
